definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: They find Jamey on the ground, bleeding from her left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 在房间里，他们发现杰米倒在地上，左手腕大量出血。

sentences.english: The bamboo stick on her right hand thrusted toward yet another swordman 's eye.
sentences.chinese: 左手微举，右手中的竹棒已向一名吴士眼中戳去。

sentences.english: The boxer feinted with his right hand and struck with his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 这个拳击手用右手佯攻而出左手击打。

sentences.english: THE uncle had a great fall and is now in hospital nursing a fractured wrist.
sentences.chinese: 大叔摔倒了，现在在医院里，左手腕打着石膏。

sentences.english: But while he wondered, he shot in a straight left, the weight of his body behind the blow.
sentences.chinese: 可同时左手又挥出了一个直拳，全身力气都压了上去。

sentences.english: Cradle it with your left hand and apply slight pressure.
sentences.chinese: 用左手抱住右上臂并对其稍稍加压。

sentences.english: He feinted with his left hand and hit me with his right.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手做了一个假动作，用右手打到了我。

sentences.english: A gold bracelet dangled from his left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 一只金手镯在他的左手腕上晃来晃去。

sentences.english: Bring a pot of left, right hand pull out Wuxian.
sentences.chinese: 左手携一壶，右手挈五絣。

sentences.english: You always hold fork in left hand and knife in right hand.
sentences.chinese: 用餐中一直左手拿叉又手拿刀。

sentences.english: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth
sentences.chinese: 你施舍的时候，不要叫左手知道右手所作的。

sentences.english: It's on your left. It's next to the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 威克牛排酒家在你的左手边，紧挨着停车场。

sentences.english: His left hand, which rested on his enamelled sword hilt, was bandaged.
sentences.chinese: 他那按在宝剑珐琅柄上的左手外面裹着绷带。

sentences.english: But he shall pour part of the oil into his own left hand.
sentences.chinese: 然后倒些油在自己左手掌中。

sentences.english: Tony was an experienced boxer and he was known for leading with his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 托尼是一个有经验的拳击家，他以左手出拳而闻名。

sentences.english: A German grenade had taken three fingers off his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 德国人的手榴弹夺走了他左手的三根手指。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
left and right hands/(fig.) capable assistant/right-hand man
